title: How to Make Violet Jelly

steps.headline: Place the flowers into a quart jar.
steps.description: Cover with boiling water. Put the lid on the jar and leave to infuse for 24 hours.

steps.headline: Strain the flowers out of the water.
steps.description: Pour the violet water into a saucepan.

steps.headline: Juice the lemon.
steps.description: Add the lemon juice and packet of pectin to 2 cups of strained violet water.

steps.headline: Bring the liquid to a boil.
steps.description: Add the 4 cups of sugar and boil for 1 more minute.

steps.headline: Remove from the heat and pour into the pre-sterilised jars.
steps.description: Seal. Store in the fridge and use within two to three weeks.

text: Place the flowers into a quart jar. Cover with boiling water. Put the lid on the jar and leave to infuse for 24 hours. Strain the flowers out of the water. Pour the violet water into a saucepan. Juice the lemon. Add the lemon juice and packet of pectin to 2 cups of strained violet water. Bring the liquid to a boil. Add the 4 cups of sugar and boil for 1 more minute. Remove from the heat and pour into the pre-sterilised jars. Seal. Store in the fridge and use within two to three weeks.
